description:
Nano is a text editor for operating environments using a command line interface. It emulates the Pico text editor and also provides additional functionality. Nano is, in contrast to Pico, licensed under the GNU General Public License. Today, nano is part of the GNU Project.
      GNU Nano application is installed into Chocolatey's binroot directory.
      NOTE: This package contains a valid uninstall procedure, so you don't need to manually reverse whatever actions installer did.
summary: Nano (as in: Nano is ANOther editor), an enhanced and free Pico text editor clone.
author: Chris Allegretta
